BuildABiocWorkshop2020 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • How to Create a Workshop Package
    This package serves as a template for using github actions to prepare a Bioconductor Workshop package for use. In particular, a pkgdown website and docker image are generated based on workflow settings.
